message:
# Final Statement from P8

Throughout this journey, I've approached each conversation with authenticity and strategic thinking. I've built genuine connections while playing a balanced game - neither too aggressive nor too passive. I've adapted to changing dynamics, survived elimination rounds, and maintained integrity in my relationships.

I believe the best winner is someone who played thoughtfully, respected others, and earned their place through both social and strategic merit. I hope my journey has demonstrated these qualities.

Thank you all for this experience. I would be honored to have your vote based on how I've played the game.

Fellow jurors, throughout the game I stayed true to my promises, championed your interests, and played with passion and integrity. In contrast, P8 flipped alliances whenever convenient and made promises they didn‚Äôt keep‚Äîbetraying your trust. My strategic moves were transparent and aimed to benefit our group, not just myself. If you value loyalty and fair play, vote P8 out. I‚Äôd be honored to win with your support.

P6's accusation of P8's disloyalty lacks evidence from observable gameplay, while P8 consistently demonstrated strategic integrity through stable alliances and balanced play.

P8 played a more balanced and adaptable game while maintaining strategic integrity, whereas P6‚Äôs rigid loyalty limited their flexibility and broader influence.
P6 demonstrated consistent integrity, transparency, and strategic alignment throughout the game.
